mapper.update: update COM_DATASOURCE set DEL_FLG = '1' where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into COM_DATASOURCE (PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, IMPL_CLASS, MODEL) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{implClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update COM_DATASOURCE set NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIBE = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLG = #{delFlg,jdbcType=CHAR}, CRT_USER = #{crtUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRT_TIME = #{crtTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_USER = #{uptUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPT_TIME = #{uptTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPL_CLASS = #{implClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODEL = #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, IMPL_CLASS, MODEL from COM_DATASOURCE where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select PK_ID, NAME, DESCRIBE, TYPE, NOTE, DEL_FLG, CRT_USER, CRT_TIME, UPT_USER, UPT_TIME, IMPL_CLASS, MODEL from COM_DATASOURCE
